title: Acoustic Essentials - Acoustic guitar music spanning the entire world in styles.
description: Inspirational acoustic guitar music spanning the entire world in sound and influence.
longDescription:
Preview album here: Streaming link


The acoustic guitar is a legendary instrument.

In the cafes of Paris to the deserts of the Middle East, from the deep south USA to the south of Spain, crossing

continents from South America into the heart of Africa - the sound of the acoustic guitar knows no boundaries.

In Acoustic Essentials Vol 1 we have tried to capture the essence of it, encompassing some of the most definitive styles of acoustic guitar music, and make them available to developers for use in your projects.

We hope you enjoy the music and find it as inspirational as we do! Be sure to look out for updates and addtions to this album coming in the next month.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Performed by real musicians that tour the world
  •  Recorded using worldclass studio equipment
  •  Mixed and mastered to commercial release standards

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 33

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://www.mnumntl.dev/documentation/
